name: @altipla/hermes
description: Advanced Vue router that improves the lifecycle callbacks.

scripts.build: echo VITE_VERSION=$BUILD_ID > .env.production && NODE_ENV=production vite build && rm .env.production
scripts.lib: echo VITE_VERSION=$BUILD_ID > .env.lib && NODE_ENV=production vite build --mode lib && rm .env.lib && npx tsc --emitDeclarationOnly --declaration --esModuleInterop --outDir dist
